duties_responsibilities.duty: Teach Social Studies to middle school students in grades 6, 7, and 8, either individually, in small groups, or entire classes.
Maintain a positive learning environment and relate effectively to all students, parents, and colleagues.
Incorporate technology into the curriculum and demonstrate multicultural and ethnic understanding and sensitivity.
Work with a diverse student population and adapt teaching to accommodate different learning styles and abilities.
Possibly coach or supervise activities and/or sports in addition to teaching responsibilities.
Model appropriate behavior and exhibit flexibility, organization, enthusiasm, and willingness to learn and develop favorable relationships with students.
Collaborate with other teachers to improve instructional performance and share professional skills with staff members.

education_certification.credential: Washington State certification and endorsements (ELL endorsement preferred)
